author: Special Correspondent
title: Coronavirus | Centre issues advisory for senior citizens
description: The advisory said senior citizens should stay at home, avoid visitors, but maintain one metre distance if necessary and remain active within the home, including light exercise and yoga.
content:
The Union Social Justice and Empowerment Ministry on Monday issued an advisory to senior citizens about how to remain safe and care for their mental health during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
